snippet: The girl was a devoted follower of Jainism, a religion that celebrates radical acts of renunciation. Her parents may faces charges of culpable homicide in her death....

byline.original: By SUHASINI RAJ and ELLEN BARRY

lead_paragraph: The girl was a devoted follower of Jainism, a religion that celebrates radical acts of renunciation. Her parents may faces charges of culpable homicide in her death.

headline.main: India Police Pressed to Act in Girl’s Death After Fast
headline.print_headline: Police in India Are Pressed From Two Sides After Death of a Girl Who Fasted
